items.sentence: There was nowhere else we could've done that.
I suggest that we let Tom do all the talking.
That's the only way we'll be able to survive.
We won't be able to survive very much longer.
Tom was the only one who was staring at Mary.
Tom was able to find what he was looking for.
The last time I did that, I almost got fired.
Tom soon realized that nobody would help him.
Do you think that I like it more than you do?
Tom's speech wasn't as interesting as Mary's.
